Content.Raw:
递归取中点建树。

```python
class Solution:
    def sortedArrayToBST(self, nums: List[int]) -> TreeNode:
        if not nums:
            return None
        mid = len(nums) // 2
        res = TreeNode(nums[mid])
        res.left = self.sortedArrayToBST(nums[0:mid])
        res.right = self.sortedArrayToBST(nums[mid+1:])
        return res
```

Title: LeetCode-108 二叉树的最大深度
